Module WitchHunt
Package fr.sos.witchhunt.view.gui.scenes

Class GridBagCell

java.lang.Object
fr.sos.witchhunt.view.gui.scenes.GridBagCell
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChoicesPanel, GamePanel.BotNotificationsPanel, GamePanel.CardsPanel, GamePanel.DeckSelectorPanel, GamePanel.ScorePanel, GamePanel.TopNotificationsPanel
public class GridBagCell extends Object
A custom graphical component used to make non-homogeneous grids out of plural components.

GridBagPanel <#>-- this. A GridBagPanel creates GridBagCells with their x and y coordinates as well as their width and heigth.

The cell's content pane is a JPanel. It supports any kind of layout managers.

See Also:
  • GridBagPanel

  • Field Details

    • gwidth

      private int gwidth
      The cell's width (number of boxes occupied horizontally in the grid). Must be lower or equal to the master GridBagPanel's grid width.

    • gheight

      private int gheight
      The cell's height (number of boxes occupied vertically in the grid). Must be lower or equal to a GridBagPanel's grid height.

    • gx

      private int gx
      The cell's top-left corner's x position in the grid. Must be lower or equal to the master GridBagPanel's grid width.

    • gy

      private int gy
      The cell's top-left corner's y position in the grid. Must be lower or equal to the master GridBagPanel's grid heigth.

    • pan

      private JPanel pan
      The cell's content pane. Supports any layout manager.

  • Constructor Details

    • GridBagCell

      public GridBagCell(int x, int y, int w, int h, Border cellBorder, List<GridBagCell> cellsList)
      This constructor should be called from GridBagPanels only.

      A master GridBagPanel determines the cell's position and size and its border.

      Parameters:
      x - x position of the top-left corner in the grid
      y - y position of the top-left corner in the grid
      w - Cell width in arbitrary units
      h - Cell height in arbitrary units
      cellBorder - Border displayed around the cell.
      cellsList - A reference to the master GridBagPanel's list of GridBagCells. When instantiated, automatically appended to this list.
      See Also:
      • GridBagPanel

    • init

      public void init()
      This method is called when the master GridBagPanel's init method is called.

      Used to configure the cells depending on their real size once they are rendered.

      Override if a special configuration is needed only after rendering the Grid.

      See Also:
      • GridBagPanel.init()
